name: I'm sorry i'm late. May i come in?
name_original: I'm sorry i'm late. May i come in?
description:
You are late for school and you need to find your way to the classroom so that no one from staff will see you

Made in 3 hours and 10 mins for TriJam-67. 

Controls:
  • A/D or arrows - move
  • E - interact
Optional challenges:
  • Share the source code of your project
